title: Imagine: Adventure Game Magazine
description: Imagine (printed under the long title Imagine: Adventure Game Magazine) was a monthly magazine dedicated to the first edition Advanced Dungeons and Dragons and Dungeons and Dragons role playing game systems published by TSR UK Limited. Imagine was published monthly between April 1983 and October 1985. The print run lasted for 31 issues (30 issues and one special edition) before its cancellation
subject: Fantasy
Science Fiction
Pulp
Wargaming
